shutter: Melles Griot 63mm (D07 and D09). D11 Low profile
power: 40W maximum power with shutter open and cooling maximum. AC/DC "brick" supply with int'l AC input plug (100-240V, 50-60 Hz). Alternate 12V input from user's source.
mounting: 5,125" bolt circle. Optional Nikon F-mount or Canon FD mount.
backfocaldistance: 1.025" (2.60cm). Optional low profile housing D11 (no shutter)
operatingenvironment: -22 degree to 27 degree C. Relative humidity
